## History.swap() method

`ISwap.swap()` implementation. Delegates to wrapped atom/cursor, but too applies `changed` predicate to determine if there was a change and if the previous value should be recorded.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
swap(fn: SwapFn<T>, ...args: any[]): T;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fn | <code>SwapFn&lt;T&gt;</code> | update function |
|  args | <code>any[]</code> | additional args passed to <code>fn</code> |

<b>Returns:</b>

`T`
